alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Orange; Osceola; Seminole; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 6:11PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Seminole, northern Brevard, southeastern Orange and northeastern Osceola Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 610 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wedgefield, moving northeast at 25 mph. Strong thunderstorm outflow winds are also pushing southward across northern Brevard County. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Titusville, Oviedo, Rockledge and Cocoa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
